job description:
ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Other duties may be assigned:
  • Gathers, analyzes and reports accurate business and financial data that is critical to business decisions and utilizes critical thinking skills to interpret the data.
  • Help to accelerate project related revenue through data forecasting, PMO metrics, and aid in room-by-room conversion tracking.
  • Provide administrative support to the PMO in gathering information, documentation, and certifications by partnering with field-based project management team members to understand current project status against project plan
  • Provide enhanced visibility to the revenue backlog, as well as develop a method to achieve four-quarter revenue forecasting while maintaining compliance with ASC606 requirements.
  • Demonstrates excellent communication skills with daily collaboration and interaction with field service personnel, project management, all levels of service leadership, and quality assurance and regulatory affairs to complete required tasks.
  • Assists in continuous improvement projects, training and/or initiatives that drive business/financial results.
  • Coordinates documentation and facilitates communications regarding the required documentation of pending, in progress and completed installations of Clinical Workflow Solutions product systems.
  • Collects and reviews Device History Records for accuracy and completeness prior to submission to document control in accordance with FDA acceptance activities standards.
EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS:
  • Demonstrated proficiency with MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
  • Must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily
  • Ability to communicate effectively and clearly to a wide-range of customers
  • Ability to define problems, identify solutions and follow through to completion
  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or Finance required
  • 1-3 years of experience
  • Experience with MS Project, MS CRM, Salesforce, PowerBI, SQL, and JD Edwards preferred
